title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form SG-4 - Citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form SG-4 - Citation

State Regulations
STANDBY GUARDIANSHIP CITATION File

No.________
SURROGATE'S COURT - ________COUNTY
CITATION
THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
By the Grace of God Free and

Independent, TO ________
A petition having been filed by ________, who is domiciled at ________
YOU ARE HEREBY CITED TO SHOW CAUSE before
the Surrogate's Court, ________ County, at ________, New York, on ________, 19________, at ________ o'clock of that day why an order should not be granted
pursuant to SCPA 1726 appointing ________ as Standby Guardian(s) of ________, an infant. (State any further relief
requested)
HON. ______________
Surrogate

Dated, Attested and Sealed, ________, 19________ ________
Chief Clerk
(Seal)

Name of

Attorney for Petitioner ____________ Tel. No. ________
Address of Attorney _____________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
SG-4

This citation is served upon you as
required by law. You are not required to appear. If you fail to appear it will
be assumed that you do not object to the relief requested. You have the right
to have an attorney-at-law appear for you. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
